about_the_game:
This add-on provides you with the "Nomad" artifact set* which will considerably strengthen your army and ensure an array of economic bonuses.

Items included:
  • Nomad's Leather Armour
  • Nomad's Belt
  • Nomad's Boots
  • Nomad's Hat
  • Nomad's Pack
  • Nomad's Talisman
  • Nomad's Ring
  • Nomad's Stick
  • Nomad's Light Shield

* make sure to construct the Vault in your Capital in order to receive the artifacts.
